author: Lon.TV
description:
A brief update from yesterday's apparently perfectly timed video - this morning updates started rolling out in force to 2nd Gen Chromecast users. Mine is now working and I'm hearing from many others who got the fix too.

title: 2nd Gen Chromecasts are Fixed!
